name: Roller Ball Splat and Paint
description:
Roller Ball Splat the Paint offers unlimited levels to explore and think your way through the maze and find the best possible outcome from the limited movement of the ball.

Blaze your way through the maze with the Ball and roll it all over while you splat colorful paint and enjoy your time.

How to Play:
Paint whole the maze
Splat the paint with the roller ball

Features:
- Free To Play Roller Splat Game
- Fun to play Levels
- Shiny
- Watery Maze
